Hey! I'm Yuan Zheng.

I am a UX & Product designer interested in promoting scientific literacy through design. Before this, I was a Ph.D. candidate in biomedical science with over 5 years scientific research experience and 6 published papers as first / (co-) author.

Fun facts about me: I am a dancer and cat sniffer!

More about Me!

I like motion design. Anything with motion, I'm groove with it! When I'm not working, I enjoy absorbing new idea through reading, experimenting with creative coding, swimming and playing with my cat!
